name: farsightedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that uses good judgment about what will be needed in the future and takes wise decisions based on this: They had farsightedly invested in cryptocurrency in its very early days. She had farsightedly decided to make her home carbon-neutral.
More examplesFewer examplesHe had farsightedly convinced himself that the motor car was the future.The CEO owed his success in publishing to having farsightedly produced the first mainstream e-books.They had farsightedly put money away regularly for many years, and so were comfortable in their retirement.
